answers.answer: Hi there!C-peptide values can range between  0.4- 4.5 ng/ml, depending on the food intake. A value of 0.66 without derangement of blood sugar levels should not be a cause of concern.Hope this information is helpful.Take care!

question: I've been seeing an alternative Dr for health concerns. He did bloodwork and was concerned I had slow onset diabetes type 1. He said my c-peptide test was .66 which he said was low. Has anyone heard of this? He is sending me to my primary care Dr for further testing. Thanks for any comments!
title: is it diabetes?
